bike.description: Enduro frame design, 6061 aluminum tubes, tapered/ovalized top tube, down tube & stays

components.description: Smash suspension fork with coil spring, 40mm travel
Alloy 36H black anodized rims with brushed brake tracks, heavy duty ATB hubs with nutted axles and 14G nickel-plated spokes
Shimano TX31 short cage rear with protective guard
Forged alloy crank, 152mm, with 36T chainring and protective double-sided chainguard
ATB style, hi-impact resin, toe-clip attachable
Alloy linear pull type with full alloy short reach levers
ATB riser, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 13mm rise x 560mm wide
Alloy pillar, 27.2 x 300mm, with 31.8mm alloy clamp
